headline: Itron Partners With Snowflake to Advance AI-Driven Grid Planning
summary: ITRI teams up with Snowflake to power advanced grid planning, helping utilities manage DER complexity, modernize grids and cut costs with AI-driven analytics.

raw.headline: Itron Partners With Snowflake to Advance AI-Driven Grid Planning

headline: Power Conditioning Units Lead Growth in Cryocooler Hardware Segment
summary: The cryocooler market, valued at USD 3.48 billion in 2025, is projected to hit USD 4.90 billion by 2030, with a CAGR of 7.1%. Key growth drivers include satellite launches, defense applications, and advancements in quantum computing and medical imaging. The power conditioning unit segment is set to grow at the highest CAGR, crucial for stable power in sensitive cryogenic systems.
